entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: S 37 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
